name: Square 1 Paragliding
about: Square1Paragliding, based in Cape Town, South Africa, is a fully recognized training facility under the South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA DTO 0033). Founded by Matthew Van Zyl, our Lead Safety Officer and Chief Flight Instructor, the school offers a range of paragliding courses from introductory sessions to advanced pilot training. Our programs include ground handling, glider management, and tandem flights, ensuring students become confident and safe solo pilots. We operate from scenic locations like Signal Hill and Lionâ€™s Head, providing breathtaking views and optimal flying conditions. With a strong focus on safety and accessibility, including adaptive paragliding for differently-abled athletes, Square1Paragliding is dedicated to making paragliding accessible to all. Join us for an unforgettable flying experience in one of the world's best paragliding destinations.
